@waterrabbit@zid: have you tried that with larger files?
do you know why the embed tag might disappear while loading?
adding a link to the complete file would help if the browser can't play it directly
when the js finishes, it leaves an <embed> or <object> for the browser, right?
in Firefox that fades out within a second
oh, <audio>
/me gets the tag to reappear by making it an <embed>, but Firefox thinks it can't play that
those tags are handled really badly
<embed> doesn't have a body, so it can't have a replacement link
<object> has a body and Firefox doesn't know it really does have builtin support for sound, so it displays the body instead
<audio> vanishes, leaving the body
but it looks like a music player for a moment
I used some CSS on http://127.0.0.1:43110/1PDFcigDTymiqMkiK5iXLgtXxDwT5ts3WC/ to make the pdf replace the download link when the browser discovers it can render that
